reviews.review: Korku, gerilim, ızdırap bunlar bir kenara çeşitli film ve dizilerden getirilen efsaneleşmiş karakterleri de oyun içine dahil edince kendi çapında zirveleş bir oyundur kişisel görüş olarak bunu söyleyebilirim.

много кемперов фиг поиграешь, баланс в игре плохой

The reason I rated the game negative is because of 2 reasons. One, the matchmaking feels uneven, you can be a new person to the game and be matched up with a very experienced killer. The second reason is there is a ton of microtransactions. You get only 5 killers, and the rest you have to buy or save up 9,000 Iridescent Shards which takes about a  month if you play often, and by the time you do so, there is a new killer out. I hope my review has helped your decision to get the game or not.
no banlanc .Killers are hard to play.
Literally just run in circles the game
I have been addicted to this game way too long
it's fun when playing with friends not randoms. a lot of the killers are sweats and make the game not as fun.
I still hate this game and everyone that plays it.

Конченая игра, в которой половина маньяков ничего сделать не могут, а другая половина - оп, против которых невозможно играть, даже не говоря про скилл, а разрабам на игроков - пoxyй, ибо нахyя нерфить убийц если можно получить дoxyя денег. Eбaные топоры охотницы, которые просто сyкa хитуют тебя на расстоянии 20 метров слева или справа, а также хитбокс ружья стрелка, который даже при прямом попадании не засчитывает.
Короче говоря донатная помойка, не рекомендую никому если только вы не дoлбoёб без матери.

very fun game, kermit likes running away from murderer that tunnel vision on him cause they dislike kermit very much but i like it it's very fun, murderer can't shoot on kermit when he running at mach 3 speed but i recommend game unless you are another kermit.
very nice!

Honestly it was fun in the first and second year, but after that they kind of ruined it by adding killers that would ruin the survivors experience and the playerbase became toxic on both sides. The survivors are toxic in chat and the killers only tunnel and camp.

O jogo possui diversos defeitos que com o tempo a gente vai percebendo, mas acima de tudo ele é bem divertido, você pode jogar com seus amigos como survival ou sozinho como Killer, é bem diversificado e exige bastante habilidade pra jogar, a comunidade é meio mimizenta, já que se perde reclamam de tudo, mas eu recomendo o jogo caso queira algo diferente e desafiante.
开始看直播跟朋友一起玩都，禁播后就弃坑了，在B站看了白小夏都视觉得好玩，又想试试，可惜自己太菜了，

It's still Alive! А если смотреть на онлайн, то живее всех живых. Вот что значит вообще нет конкурентов по цеху (доживших до сих пор)   (─‿‿─)

lots of flaws but still has enjoyable moments. i recommend to play with friends

Esse jogo é um máximo! Sei que muita gente não pretende gastar seu dinheiro com jogos, principalmente na época que estamos, mas se quiser jogar algo bom e diferente, Dead By Daylight é minha recomendação!
Gutes Spiel, entspannte Community, recht gutes Balancing, 2-3 entspannte Runden sind gut würde es aber nicht 3-4 Stunden am Tag spielen wollen. Geht alleine und mit Freunden
萌新玩人类毫无游戏体验，鬼守尸鞭尸，队友也没人救。萌新不熟悉地图和鬼，基本见鬼倒。玩鬼还好
Amazing game i love it so much
Kinda funn ngl, even if I get mad most of the time I still enjoy it.
优秀的匹配机制，我12阶屠夫匹配到全是红阶。我9阶人直接给我来一个1阶屠夫。真不错，真不错
挺好玩的，主要是排到外国的人，就会卡
Un muy buen juego, es muy divertido y original, los asesinos estan muy buenos y es ideal para jugar con amigos y divertirse.
Tagutaguan maliwanag ang buwan. Wala sa likod wala sa harap. Pag bilang kong sampo nakatago na kayo.

Herkes oyun ararken cok fazla bekletiyor yazmış ama oyunda aramayı baslatmadan önce size soruyor seçim hakkı veriyorseciminize göre  katil yada kurban olabiliyorsunuz yani bekletmesi biraz normal onun dışında oyun bence zor bazen katil çok avantajsız kalıyor bazende kurbanlar ama onun dışında oyun iyi neredeyse hiç bug yok grafikleride iyi

- The developers of the game have a bad habit of completely breaking one of the games mainmechanics when releasing a new update
- If the killer or the survivor decides to just go out of their way to complete ruin the fun for his opponents he can totally do that, a big part of the games graphics, animations and gameplaybalances are still stuck in 2016 and are in dire need of an update
- The community is completely divided into Killer- and surivorsplayers and both sides are in a constant war when talking about the games balancing and can only agree in a collectiv hate against the developers who constantly change from beeing unbelievably incompetent to very helpfull and innovativ

But in the end its a good game, would recommend

꾸준한 게임 플레이로 인하여 나의 실력 또한 꾸준히 상승하였다.
나의 동체 시력이 향상되며 자꾸만 느려져만 가는 살인마들, 살인마들의 울부짖는 소리가 내 귓가에 맴돈다.
협동 게임이기에 회사에서 프로젝트를 할 때도 도움이 되었다.
실제로도 본인은 프로젝트에서 데바데를 활용하여 좋은 성과를 이끌어냈다.

데바데의 모든 이야기는 제작자의 정신세계에서 출발한다.
실제로 제작자는 어릴 적부터 데바데와 똑같은 스토리의 환각 증상을 많이 받았 이예나ㄱ새끼
It's pretty much a game of hide-and-seek.. Fun and exciting with the element of death and torture! Just the right game to play these quarantine times
一点都不恐怖，就是画面有点昏暗，不过可以调节亮度，走路的时候要小心路上的夹子，修电机的时候要小心隐身的幽灵，不说了，我去换个纸尿布
Bought the game cause i'm a masochist!

Après 1000 heures passées sur le jeu, et être passé rang 1 des deux côtés du jeu, on voit que malheureusement le jeu tourne en rond. Il est difficile de s'amuser au delà du rang 5 à cause principalement de la communauté. Il devient fréquent de se faire "focus" après un décrochage etc... Je conseillerai ce jeu à des personnes ne voulant pas y investir des centaines d'heures. Malgré ma critique dans l'ensemble négative, ça reste un très bon jeu où j'ai beaucoup rigolé.
Das Spiel macht einfach spaß, egal ob mit oder ohne Freunde. Besonders gefällt mir das man dieses Spiel sehr entspannt spielen kann. Es geht nicht darum zu gewinnen sondern nur darum spaß zu haben.
I really enjoy this game, dont get me wrong, but corporate greed forces me to give it a negative review.
Being brutally murdered has never been so fun.
